Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.name: init(data:httpResponse:error:)
Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.abstract: Initialises the Response class by providing the parameters as received response from the server

Classes/Request.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSe.name: init(credentials:)
Classes/Request.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSe.abstract: Inititate parameters of a request that needs to be made

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: init(url:app:credentials:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Creates an Elastic Search class object for Appbase

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: index(type:id:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Adds given JSON data to the database (POST/PUT request)

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: get(type:id:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Fetches data from the database for the provided unique id (GET request)

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: delete(type:id:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Deletes data from the database for the provided unique id (GET request)

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: update(type:id:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Update data of the provided unique id (GET request)

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: bulk(type:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Make bulk requests on a specified app or a specific type. Bulk requests can be any of index, update and delete requests.

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: search(type:searchString:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Make search of JSON documents through given string using Elasticsearch’s expressive Query DSL.

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: msearch(type:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Apply a search via the request body. The request body is constructed using the Query DSL.

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: getStream(type:id:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Get streaming updates to a document with the specified id. The stream=true parameter informs the appbase.io service to keep the connection open, which is used to provide subsequent updates.

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: getMapping(type:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Provides the data mapping corresponding to the app or the type.

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: getTypes(headers:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Provides the number of types which you have made in your appbase dashboard.

Classes/Authenticate.html#/s:18SwiftElas.name: credentials
Classes/Authenticate.html#/s:18SwiftElas.abstract: A string consisting of all the alphanumeric and some special characters

Classes/Authenticate.html#/s:18SwiftElas.name: appExists(headers:)
Classes/Authenticate.html#/s:18SwiftElas.abstract: The appExists method checks if the app provide in the Client class as inititaliser exists

Classes/Authenticate.html#/s:18SwiftElas.name: typeExits(type:headers:)
Classes/Authenticate.html#/s:18SwiftElas.abstract: The typeExists method checks if the type provide in the methods used in Client class exists or not.

Classes/Authenticate.html.name: Authenticate
Classes/Authenticate.html.abstract: Used for authenticating app and type properties used in Client.swift class

Classes/Errors.html.name: Errors
Classes/Errors.html.abstract: Class for handling different types of errors

Classes/Request.html.name: Request
Classes/Request.html.abstract: Class to handle the GET, POST PUT and DELETE requests made from any class inside the library

Classes/Response.html.name: Response
Classes/Response.html.abstract: This class handles the responses that are received from the server when any request is made. It also handles any error while receiving the response.
